name: Make Emoji Jump
description:
Make Emoji Jump is an innovative endless arcade game in which you help the emoji running as far as possible. You must hop among colorful lines and dodge among obstacles. Watch out! The game is extremely addictive!

HOW TO PLAY
-Tap left screen to jump left and tap right screen to jump right
-Stay on the colorful lines

FEATURES
- Easy to learn,Hard to master
- Huge number of obstacles to conquer
- Emojis will change when you jump
- More original Emojis coming soon
- It's really hard ;-)
